content.html: Guillermo del Toro’s ‘PINOCCHIO’ is set in Italy in the early 1900s during the rise of fascism “He is recruited into the village military camp because the fascist official in town thinks if this puppet cannot die it would make the perfect soldier” (via: vanityfair.com/hollywood/2022…)
content.value:
Guillermo del Toro’s ‘PINOCCHIO’ is set in Italy in the early 1900s during the rise of fascism

“He is recruited into the village military camp because the fascist official in town thinks if this puppet cannot die it would make the perfect soldier”

(via: vanityfair.com/hollywood/2022…)
